page.title: 18SHOPS AND OFFICES(Continued)
page.content: 19.Crocks and Crystals-Glass shop 20.Needlebox-Sewing shop 21.Kingswood Chemists 22.Broadway Tyres-Garage 23.Car Park 24.Empty Shop 25.Lucy's Gardens-silk flowers 26.Sir Christophers Wine Bar Some years ago some of the shops were different from what they are today. These nos.on the list used to be:- 2.Printers 4.Alan's sweet shop 6.Cinema 10.Wet fish Shop 11.Wetheralls-Tailor 12.Maurice Lund 13-14.Small cottages 15.Hinley the sweet shop 18.Video Box 21.Tidy,the Chemist 25.Clockmaker
